title.narrative: Consolidating and Disseminating Efforts to Combat Forced Labor in Brazil and Peru

description.narrative: Advocacy for international labour standards, labour law, fundamental principles and rights at work (child labour, forced labour, non-discrimination in the workplace, freedom of association and collective bargaining); formalisation of informal work, occupational safety and health.

This award supports advocacy for international labor standards, labor law, fundamental principles and rights at work. More specifically, this includes To strengthen efforts in Brazil and Peru to combat forced labor through capacity building for governmental, private sector, and civil society organizations..
